channel.title: Pirate (Neutral Offensive)
channel.description:
Passive: Sailor Instinct Night Immune Passive: Back into the Crime Scene Can know the faction of your target after the maraud
Day Ability: Marginalize - 3 Make someone vote guilty on the execution - The player gets the message : "A Pirate forced you to vote guilty on the execution"
Night Ability 1: Plunder Maraud and Occupy someone during the night. You can't choose the same person for the rest of the game
Night Ability 2: Check the Target - 2 See your targets faction
Goal: Maraud 1 player for each faction

Passive: Back into the Crime Scene
Can know the faction of your target after the maraud

Make someone vote guilty on the execution

  • The player gets the message : “A Pirate forced you to vote guilty on the execution”

Night Ability 1: Plunder
Maraud and Occupy someone during the night. You can’t choose the same person for the rest of the game

Night Ability 2: Check the Target - 2
See your targets faction

Goal: Maraud 1 player for each faction
